casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jamonte Dion BAKER. No. 4P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Jamonte Dion Baker, Polkton, for Baker, Jamonte Dion. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of January 2016 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016." ERVIN, J. recused.
